summary: Adds a standalone male follower to he Bee and Barb in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New]First of all, I'm not a native English-speaker, so I apologize for any headache-causing mistakes. -v-
Also this is my first mod ( actually it's not. It's my first mod on Nexus, but anyway. ), so please report any bugs or missing textures so I can put things right. (:
If you're looking for a speciial-combat-follower, search elsewhee. He doesn't do anything more than normal Vanilla followers do, just looking nice. :D


~INFOS~
Name: Felix Verres
Combat Style: 2H Warrior
Location: Bee and Barb, Riften
Custom-Dialogue: Yes
Custom-Voice: No. [ I'd voice my followers by myself but I'm a female haha. ]


He has a standalone Face, but no body. Just use whatever body-mod you like, I prefer it this way.
And he actually has some "flirtatious" Lines in the Dialogue too. For both genders. Just warnin' you.
I'd be happy about reviews, and add screenshots if you like. :3
Maybe I'll add a more appropriate description later, I'll see.

____________________________________________________________________________________________


[b]~CREDITS~[/b][/font]
[font=Courier New]Young Male Face Texture by [b]Fuse00[/b]
Brows by [b]Hvergelmir
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by [b]Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/b]
[/b]Satan's Hairpack [ not available anymore I think ]
Enhanced Character Edit by [b]ECE team[/b]
The Eyes Of Beauty by [b]Gabriel Mailhot[/b]

[b]
~RECOMMENDED MODS~[/b]
S.A.M by VectorPlexus
TDN Equipable Horns by [b]Nightshade[/b]
Pierced Ears - Earrings by [b]Nostromo79[/b]
Extensible Follower Framework by [b]Expired


[/b]I really hope you like him, and thanks to all the original Modders.~ ♥

[/font][/center]
author: masakrr
